'''0.2.4''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on November 10, 2010, for client version [[Alpha v1.2.2|v1.2.2]].<ref>{{tumblr|notch|1534664976|Minecraft Alpha v1.2.2, Minecraft Server 0.2.4}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* New server-configuration setting: <code>no-animals</code>.

== Fixes ==
* <code>hellworld=true</code> no longer overwrite old save chunks.
* Boats are now visible to other players.
* Players can now ride minecarts and boats.
* Minecarts now move smoother.
* Fishing now works.
* Buckets can now pick up fluid.
* Sheep and cows look like sheep and cows.
* Now able to steer server-side boats.
* Stairs being difficult to destroy fixed.
* Increased the timeout before "took too long to log in" appears.
